name: Kheprix
overview:
Kheprix is developing high quality designs and professional software solutions. We cover everything from web development and computer graphics, to Windows desktop applications, from simple, stand-alone projects, to database driven, client-server applications.

We are trying to live up to the expectations represented by our slogan, Smart Solutions for Better Businesses – when creating something we try to come up with the smartest solution while having in mind the type of business for which the project is being developed. Quality comes first for us, because we would like to build long lasting relationships with all our customers – and this can be achieved only by providing impeccable service.
